heading: face value
subheading: from rwanda to the former yugoslavia, child-tracing programs are reuniting orphans of war" with their families. inside the huge tent of bamboo covered with plastic sheeting sit rows and rows and rows of little faces, 2- by 4-inch photographs pasted on makeshift boards with clumsy signs written on pieces of recycled cardboard. and all around, […]
author: marie de la soudière
